pkgmetadata.longdescription: # mondayA python client for the monday.com GraphQL APIFor the Monday API docs, [click here](https://monday.com/developers/v2#introduction-section).#### Requirements- Python >= 3.6#### Getting started`pip install monday``monday` sample usage:```pythonfrom monday import MondayClientmonday = MondayClient('your token')monday.items.create_item(board_id='12345678', group_id='today', item_name='Do a thing')```
